segments.text: I see two children involved in a very covert operation, very hush-hush.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, precarious on a two-step stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, his little hand almost completely inside, a true effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, her hand open, anticipating her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a feat of balance he's performing on that wobbly stool, truly impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over any second, it’s truly unstable and nerve-wracking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s done this before, he seems so focused on the delicious task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their delicious mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be so thrilled to be getting away with this secret snack, a real triumph.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and break that plate he's holding, or himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, full of daring and the sweetness of forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to have quite the story to tell, or not tell, later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sort of secret adventure is exactly what wonderful childhood memories are made of.
segments.speaker: PAR
